snippet: The World Cup party may be over but the summer of soccer is just heating up in the United States as fans prepare for a European invasion by the sport's glamour clubs looking to expand their brand....

headline.print_headline: World Cup Party Over but Summer of Soccer Set to Rock U.S
headline.main: World Cup Party Over but Summer of Soccer Set to Rock U.S

lead_paragraph: The World Cup party may be over but the summer of soccer is just heating up in the United States as fans prepare for a European invasion by the sport's glamour clubs looking to expand their brand.
